narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Palco, Inc. is a Supports Brokerage provider based in Maumelle, AR. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $23.7M in Medicaid payments across 244K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $23.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
